name: Warren Navigator
summary: You're particularly good at solving mazes and navigating twists and turns.
description:
You're particularly good at solving mazes and navigating twists and turns. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Survival. If you would automatically become trained in Survival (from your background or class, for example), you become trained in another skill of your choice. When you Sense Direction or attempt a roll against a maze spell, you get a result one degree of success better than you rolled. You don't take a penalty to Sense Direction when you lack a compass.Traits

Ratfolk: A creature with this trait is a member of the ratfolk ancestry. Ratfolk are humanoids who resemble rats. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by ratfolk.
